Translations.Text: del kmean anaknea chaul tow knong noh krawpi chn touchcharit
delke ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar) ning ban berchenh ( pi chomnue leu a l laoh) noh laey
haey ke nung banhchiesa anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ampi vea( nork)
del brichcheak tropy sa mb tde robsa ke daembi saamatakhluon
haey ke min trauvkar kar tabasnang nie k meat pi anaknea mneak laey
leuklengte daembi svengork kar ylprom pi mcheasa robsa ke da mha utdongk utdam bonnaoh
haey ke pitchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan( avei del yeung tabasnang dl ke)
a l laoh sbath nung pelopruk
ning peloyb nowpel del vea ngngut
mcheasa robsa anak( ao mou ham meat) minban baohbng anak ning minban saabkhpaem anak laey
chea karpit nasa thngai barlok brasaer samreab anak cheang lokey nih towtiet
haey mcheasa robsa anak pitchea nung bratan( nie k meat)aoy anak . haey anak brakadchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan
tae trong min bankheunh anak( mou ham meat) chea kaunkamprea ning ban theroksaa anak te ryy
haey trong bankheunh anak v nge vng ruoch trong ban changaoulobangheanh phlauv dl anak te ryy
haey trong bankheunh anakchea anakakr ruoch trong ban thveu aoy anak mean ban te ryy
dau che neah chaur anak kom kiebasangkot champoh kaunkamprea aoy saoh
haey chaur anak kom koumhk champoh anaksomtean aoy saoh
rie nie k meat del mcheasa robsa anak ban bratan aoy noh chaur anak riebreab( doengkoun)
tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
haey pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung se ch kei d lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
dau che neah nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar lokey) ruochreal haey chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung
haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt chaur anak bng brathnea ning sangkhum
